author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

Part of #31061. The (`Cosmic`)`ParametersDefinerForTP` were ESProducts that read data products from `Event` and `EventSetup`. Their API looked like the simplest way to migrate them to EventSetup-consumes would be to transform them to helper classes. All the corresponding ESProducer and configuration infrastructure is removed in this PR.

In addition this PR removes unnecessary dependencies to `boost` and `root` from `SimTracker/TrackAssociation`.

Resolves https://github.com/makortel/framework/issues/224.

#### PR validation:

Limited matrix runs.
title: Migrate (Cosmic)ParametersDefinerForTP to esConsumes()
